page.title: 15THE LODGE, WIGGINTON HEATH
page.content: MR.&MRS.STUART JENKINSON HAVE LIVED AT THE LODGE FOR 9 YEARS. THE ORIGINAL OWNERS WERE THE COBB FAMILY WHO BUILT THE HOUSE 155 YEARS AGO.THE JENKINSONS LIVED IN GERMANY BEFORE COMING TO ENGLAND.THEY LIKE WHERE THE HOUSE IS SITUATED.IT HAS A THIRD OF AN ACRE GARDEN.THE NEAREST VILLAGE IS ABOUT 1\ MILES AWAY AND THE NEAREST POST OFFICE IS AT WIGGINTON.THERE IS A PAPER ROUND MILK ROUND AND A BUS SERVICE EVERY DAY. THEIR DAUGHTER IS A STUDENT AT BURFORD AND DRIVES THERE EVERY DAY. THEIR HOBBIES ARE GOLF,GARDENING AND BRIDGE.THE NEARBY GOLF COURSE IS ONE OF THE BEST IN THE AREA AND THEY ARE MEMBERS. HIS JOB IS AN ACCOUNTANT AT UPPER HEYFORD ,HER JOB IS A BOOK KEEPER AND THEIR DAUGHTER IS A PART TIME WAITRESS IN A PUB.
